1160480.name: Boot : Game Dev Sim
1160480.description:
In Boot Game Dev Sim engage in a video game developer career. You start the adventure in 1980, at your parent's house and evolve progressively in a studio to your tastes. Create your games, Consoles and Game Engines and sell them to grow your business.
Stand out from the other studios by offering quality games. Choose to be an honest studio or use corruption and other methods to get yourself in the place of the biggest video game studio.
